name: Hydrapak Stash Bottle 750ml
description: Empty bottles are a waste of space. The Stash is there when you need it, barely there when you don’t. A firm top and bottom keep it upright when it’s full. When it’s empty, the soft TPU body packs down to nearly nothing and provides excellent puncture resistance. Keep in your gym bag or daypack for packable, deployable hydration.Made from BPA-free, PVC-free TPU.Naturally anti-fungal.42mm opening fits most standard water filters.Moulded top and bottom with custom snap-fit storage feature.Collapses to 5cm.
